name: birthdate
description: The birthdate of the subject, yyyy-mm-dd

name: creation_date
description: The creation date of the analysed file, yyyy-mm-dd

name: age
description: Subject age at the recording date

name: event_class
description: The class of the events for the report

name: event_group
description: The group of the events for the report

name: event_name
description: The name of the events for the report

name: crit_evt_section
description: Report Event Criteria : event selection (Sleep only, recording time, Awake in sleep period, Before sleep onset)

name: crit_evt_min_sec
description: Report Event Criteria : minimum event duration (s). i.e. 0.5

name: crit_evt_max_sec
description: Report Event Criteria : maximum event duration (s). i.e. 10

name: crit_evt_min_interval_sec
description: Report Event Criteria : minimum interval (s) to create a series. i.e. 5

name: crit_evt_max_interval_sec
description: Report Event Criteria :  maximum interval (s) to create a series. i.e. 90

name: crit_evt_min_count_series
description: Report Event Criteria : minimum number of events into a series. i.e. 4

name: crit_excl_min_interval_resp_sec
description: Report Event Criteria : exclude event that starts during the minimum interval (s) with a respiratory event end. i.e. -3.5

name: crit_excl_max_interval_resp_sec
description: Report Event Criteria : exclude event that starts during the maximum interval (s) with a respiratory event end. i.e. 8

name: crit_end_period_delay_min
description: Report Event Criteria : Delay (min) without events to end a period. i.e. 15

name: evt_asso_to_resp_count
description: Results :  Number of events associated with respiratory events.

name: evt_excl_count
description: Results : Number of events excluded after criteria application.

name: periods_delay_count
description: Results : number of periods based on the end_period_delay criteria.

name: evt_sleep_first_wake_count
description: Results : number of events in sleep or in the first awake epoch (preceding epoch must be sleep).

name: evt_sleep_first_wake_index
description: Results : event index (number of events/hour) in sleep or first awake epoch (evt_sleep_first_wake_count/hours of sleep stage).

name: evt_asso_arousal_count
description: Results : number of events associated with an arousal i.e. The event occurs in sleep but the next epoch is awake or the event occurs in awake but the preceding epoch is sleep.

name: asleep_percent
description: Results: '%' of time slept occupied by the event

name: record_percent
description: Results: '%' of recording (from sleep onset to last asleep stage) occupied by the event

name: third1_evt_avg_sec
description: third 1 : average duration of the events (s)

name: third1_evt_index
description: third 1 : number of events per hour in asleep stage

name: third2_evt_avg_sec
description: third 2 : average duration of the events (s)

name: third2_evt_index
description: third 2 : number of events per hour in asleep stage

name: third3_evt_avg_sec
description: third 3 : average duration of the events (s)

name: third3_evt_index
description: third 3 : number of events per hour in asleep stage

name: half1_evt_avg_sec
description: half 1 : average duration of the events (s)

name: half1_evt_index
description: half 1 : number of events per hour in asleep stage

name: half2_evt_avg_sec
description: half 2 : average duration of the events (s)

name: half2_evt_index
description: half 2 : number of events per hour in asleep stage

name: total_evt_avg_sec
description: Total : average duration of the events (s)

name: total_evt_index
description: Total : number of events per hour in asleep stage

name: W_evt_avg_sec
description: W : average duration of the events (s)

name: W_evt_index
description: W : number of events per hour (epochs from stage['0'])

name: N1_evt_avg_sec
description: N1 : average duration of the events (s)

name: N1_evt_index
description: N1 : number of events per hour (epochs from stage['1'])

name: N2_evt_avg_sec
description: N2 : average duration of the events (s)

name: N2_evt_index
description: N2 : number of events per hour (epochs from stage['2'])

name: N3_evt_avg_sec
description: N3 : average duration of the events (s)

name: N3_evt_index
description: N3 : number of events per hour (epochs from stage['3'])

name: NREM_evt_avg_sec
description: NREM : average duration of the events (s)

name: NREM_evt_index
description: NREM : number of events per hour (epochs from stage['1', '2', '3'])

name: R_evt_avg_sec
description: R : average duration of the events (s)

name: R_evt_index
description: R : number of events per hour (epochs from stage['5'])

name: Unscored_evt_avg_sec
description: Unscored : average duration of the events (s)

name: Unscored_evt_index
description: Unscored : number of events per hour (epochs from stage['9', '8'])

name: cyc1_evt_avg_sec
description: cycle 1 : average duration of the events (s)

name: cyc1_evt_index
description: cycle 1 : number of events per hour

description: cycle 2 : average duration of the events (s)

name: cyc2_evt_index
description: cycle 2 : number of events per hour
